channel.title: MongoHub
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.4.1
item.description: - 32bit and 64bit</br> - Crash fixed when using an authenticated database</br> - Show all the databases when using authentication</br> - Use "admin" database when there is no database set for the authentication</br> - Crash fixed when searching for mongo document with "{ "$oid" : "4E40C5111F85DD1BE9FAF825" }"</br> - Adding the error message when the search criteria is invalid</br> - Trying to be nice to complete your criteria. To search for an id, you can either type: </br> * 123</br> * "abc"</br> * "$oid" : "123"</br> * {"$oid" : "123"}</br> - Adding Command-R in the index view to reload the index list</br>
